full_threads.body:
@andy All good on this one. I have enabled the 3d secure to the payment settings.

I have responded to the other email

(Time: 15mins)

Hi Joel,

Would you be able to check this out monday?

I'm hoping it's a config in the plugin that we can enable.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Sun, Mar 23, 2025 at 9:29 AM
Subject: Re: FW: Enabling 3DS
To: Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au>
Cc: Lee Baumwol - Total Eyecare <lbaumwol@totaleyecare.com.au>, Heath Maguire <heath.maguire@wolfiq.com.au>, Joel Maligalig <joel@wolfiq.com.au>


Hi Erin,

Thanks for your patience.

We're going to investigate the Payer Authentication (3DS) in the plugin on Monday.

We will send you an update by the end of day.

Thanks,
Andy

On Fri, Mar 21, 2025 at 3:23 PM Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

Thank you for your reply, much appreciated!

And yes please, if you can do this as a matter of priority for us we would be very grateful. We suspect there have been multiple fraudulent transactions in the last week so we are keen to get something in place as soon as possible to ensure they don't continue.

We'll wait to hear back from you next week!
Cheers

Erin Skinner
 TOTAL EYECARE SUPPORT GROUP
Administration Manager

Total Eyecare Support Group
18 Magnet Court, Sandy Bay TAS 7005
P: 03 6231 5744 E: accounts@totaleyecare.com.au
totaleyecare.com.au

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 21 March 2025 2:56 PM
To: Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au>
Cc: Lee Baumwol - Total Eyecare <lbaumwol@totaleyecare.com.au>; Heath Maguire <heath.maguire@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: FW: Enabling 3DS


Hi Erin,

Jumping in here as Heath is out of office today.


Yes - we can review this for you. It will take some time so let us get back to you early next week.


Thanks,
Andy

On Fri, Mar 21, 2025 at 11:17 AM Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au> wrote:
Hi Heath (cc Lee Baumwol)!

I hope you don't mind me emailing you directly with this but I just wanted to pick up on a conversation you were part of with us earlier last year in regards to increasing security for the payments to our website. That conversation went a little bit around in a circle and unfortunately nothing eventuated from it (most likely my fault), but I have now looked at this again due to some suspicious transactions we have seen come through in the last week.

ANZ Worldline have been really helpful and have responded to me this morning to let me know that the 3D Secure I was enquiring about is not currently in use but everything is in place so that it can be with your help.

Would you mind reading their response to me below and let me know if you are able to make this happen please? And if not, please advise what you need from us in order for it to be implemented.

Thank you!

Erin Skinner
 TOTAL EYECARE SUPPORT GROUP
Administration Manager

Total Eyecare Support Group
18 Magnet Court, Sandy Bay TAS 7005
P: 03 6231 5744 E: accounts@totaleyecare.com.au
totaleyecare.com.au



CONFIDENTIAL: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager. This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named. If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate, distribute or copy this email. Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system. If you are not the intended recipient you are notified that disclosing, copying, distributing or taking any action in reliance on the contents of this information is strictly prohibited.




From: Aditya Chakravarthy <Aditya.Chakravarthy@worldline.anz.com> On Behalf Of ANZ Worldline Payment Solutions eCommerce Support
Sent: Friday, 21 March 2025 11:05 AM
To: Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au>
Cc: ANZ Worldline Payment Solutions eCommerce Support <ANZeCommerceSupport@worldline.anz.com>
Subject: RE: Enabling 3DS


Good morning Erin,

We have been confirmed by CyberSource support that 3DS has been enabled in both the Test and Live environments for your MID anztotalcon.
I have Investigated your transactions and can see there are NO 3DS transactions. It seems Payer Authentication (3DS) is not configured in your REST API.
Please refer to Payer Authentication guide for your web developer/IT : Payer Authentication which has steps to Implement payer Auth (3DS) in your integration.
If you are using a plugin in your Integration, I would Advise you to contact plugin support for 3DS implementation.

Please feel free to CC your developer in the email chain for any further enquiries. Look forward to your response to assist further.



Best Regards,

Aditya Chakravarthy
Application Support Engineer
Platform and Terminal Management | ANZ worldline Payment Solutions


Contact: anzecommercesupport@worldline.com.au

Lvl 15 727 Collins Street
Docklands VIC 3008

www.anzworldline.com


From: Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 20 March 2025 2:13 PM
To: ANZ Worldline Payment Solutions eCommerce Support <ANZeCommerceSupport@worldline.anz.com>
Subject: RE: Enabling 3DS


CAUTION: This email originated from outside of ANZ. Verify the sender is authentic and that the content is safe before taking action, clicking links, opening attachments, and/or following instructions (e.g. payment requests).

Hi Aditya,

Thank you so much for responding to me and looking into this for us!

I'm fairly sure that 3DS is not currently enabled for us, or if it is it isn't working. So we are keen to enable it or add whatever extra security we can as soon as possible please. We are pretty confident our site has been used for fraudulent activity this week so obviously want to prevent anything further as soon as we can.

I'll wait to hear from you!
Thank you

Erin Skinner
 TOTAL EYECARE SUPPORT GROUP
Administration Manager

Total Eyecare Support Group
18 Magnet Court, Sandy Bay TAS 7005
P: 03 6231 5744 E: accounts@totaleyecare.com.au
totaleyecare.com.au

If you are not the intended recipient you are notified that disclosing, copying, distributing or taking any action in reliance on the contents of this information is strictly prohibited.




From: Aditya Chakravarthy <Aditya.Chakravarthy@worldline.anz.com> On Behalf Of ANZ Worldline Payment Solutions eCommerce Support
Sent: Thursday, 20 March 2025 2:05 PM
To: Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au>
Cc: ANZ Worldline Payment Solutions eCommerce Support <ANZeCommerceSupport@worldline.anz.com>
Subject: RE: Enabling 3DS


Hello Erin,

Hope you are doing good. We are sorry to hear that you have go in circles to enable 3D secure for your facility.

I checked you account and was able to locate cardinal cruise credentials which normally indicates your facility is enabled for 3D secure.
I have also raised with request now with CyberSource support to confirm if 3DS is enabled in the backend. I will reach out to you to advise further once I receive a response from CyberSource (1-2days for a response).

Appreciate time and patience while we are waiting for a response from CyberSource support.

Best Regards,

Aditya Chakravarthy
Application Support Engineer
Platform and Terminal Management | ANZ worldline Payment Solutions


Contact: anzecommercesupport@worldline.com.au

Lvl 15 727 Collins Street
Docklands VIC 3008

www.anzworldline.com


From: Accounts - Total Eyecare <accounts@totaleyecare.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 19 March 2025 6:45 PM
To: ANZ Worldline Payment Solutions eCommerce Support <ANZeCommerceSupport@worldline.anz.com>
Subject: Enabling 3DS
Importance: High


CAUTION: This email originated from outside of ANZ. Verify the sender is authentic and that the content is safe before taking action, clicking links, opening attachments, and/or following instructions (e.g. payment requests).

Dear ANZ eCommerce Support Team,

I'm hoping you can help us to work through enabling 3D Secure on the facility we currently have with you.

We discussed enabling this last year but have not made any progress before doing so. However, we suspect that fraudulent activity has occurred in the facility over the last week and so wish to pick this conversation up again. What do you need from me to be able to look at this?

Our merchant ID is: anztotalcon
My user ID is: Admin_Erin
(however, the email registered to me is not this email address)

I obviously won't disclose any further login information via email but can do at some point for verification if required, or can move to the email address that is registered to my user ID.

Last year we were advised by Aditya Chakravarthy from ANZ Worldline to speak with our web developer to activate 3D Secure v2. However we were then advised by our web developer to ask Cybersource if they can implement 3D Secure in the gateway. And the conversation was then not pursued any further.

I have just looked in our Cybersource portal at our Payer Authentication Configuration and it states "Cardinal Cruise credentials are required for 3DS 2 Payer Authentication. Contact Cardinal or your CyberSource representative to receive these values." So I have then had a live chat with Cybersource and they tell me that due to "contractual terms with ANZ Worldline Payment Solutions" I need to contact you.

As you can see, we are going around in circles!
So I would really appreciate your help in determining if we can activate the 3D Secure to help minimize the fraud activity that we have seen and how to do it. Is that something you can help me with please?

Thank you!

Erin Skinner
 TOTAL EYECARE SUPPORT GROUP
Administration Manager

Total Eyecare Support Group
18 Magnet Court, Sandy Bay TAS 7005
P: 03 6231 5744 E: accounts@totaleyecare.com.au
totaleyecare.com.au
